item.title: Toronto Shelter Usage During the 2020 Covid Pandemic
item.description: Introduction Based on the Canada Labor Force Survey over the past couple months the unemployment rate in Toronto has risen to 14.2% in August 2020. The highest it has been since 2001 (Stats Canada 2020). This largely stems from the pandemic the country is currently grappling with and the large effect it has on the Toronto service sector(Gellatly 2020). However, when looking at shelter usage you find somethign interesting. Despite the normal prediction that higher unemployment would lead to an increase in the need for shelter spaces, that is not the trend that emerges in the data.
